summary: This mod changes the look of the protection spells (the visuals actually represent the corresponding material).
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the look of the protection spells (the visuals actually represent the material).
[youtube]wUjlygJgf7c[/youtube]

Review by Brodual:
[youtube]GuCg8KgXbTg[/youtube]

All the vanilla alteration armor spells ([b]Ebonyflesh, Ironflesh, Oakflesh, Stoneflesh[/b] and [b]Dragonflesh[/b]) share the same boring visual effect.

However, the original Bethesda's intention was to provide a [b]unique look[/b] for each spell. For some reason, they replaced those visuals with simple glow-style effect before the release. I didn't make the effects from the scratch, I just restored them from the resources.

I don't like the Bethesda's version of [b]Dragonhide[/b], so I decided to tweak it a bit and provide a simple texture animation (please, check the optional files if you don't like the animated version).

Note: such changes are also included in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url], so you don't have to install this mod if you already have CRF.
However, Cutting Room Floor doesn't include the animated Dragonhide.

This mod WILL conflict with any other mod that changes these spells.
Safe to use. Feel free to install/uninstall at any time.

Please, check my other works:
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49038]Bloodthirst (Vampire NPCs will feed just like the player)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49654]Dark Maneuvers - Vampire Lord enhancement (Harkon Shield, Undead Lords, etc)[/url]
